alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 3:36PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern St. Lucie and southeastern Indian River Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 336 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fort Pierce South, or over White City, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Port Saint Lucie, Walton, Fort Pierce, Vero Beach and Vero Beach South. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie
